# Agent Skills CLI

> The Universal Skill Manager for AI Coding Agents

Agent Skills CLI is a command-line tool that enables developers to install, manage, and sync 50,000+ skills across all major AI coding assistants including Cursor, Claude Code, GitHub Copilot, OpenAI Codex, and Antigravity.

## Quick Start

```bash
npm install -g agent-skills-cli
skills install @anthropic/xlsx
```

## Key Features

- **50,000+ Skills**: Access the largest marketplace of AI agent skills
- **Universal Compatibility**: Works with Cursor, Claude Code, GitHub Copilot, OpenAI Codex, Antigravity
- **One Command Install**: `skills install <skill-name>`
- **Auto-Detection**: Automatically detects installed AI agents
- **Platform Targeting**: Install to specific platforms with `-t claude,cursor`

## Supported Platforms

| Platform | Directory | Status |
|----------|-----------|--------|
| Cursor | `.cursor/skills` | ✓ Supported |
| Claude Code | `.claude/skills` | ✓ Supported |
| GitHub Copilot | `.github/skills` | ✓ Supported |
| OpenAI Codex | `.codex/skills` | ✓ Supported |
| Antigravity | `.agent/workflows` | ✓ Supported |

## Core Commands

- `skills install <name>` - Install a skill
- `skills list` - List installed skills
- `skills search <query>` - Search marketplace
- `skills update` - Update installed skills
- `skills doctor` - Diagnose issues

## Resources

- Documentation: https://agentskills.in/docs
- Marketplace: https://agentskills.in/marketplace
- GitHub: https://github.com/Karanjot786/agent-skills-cli
- npm: https://www.npmjs.com/package/agent-skills-cli
